amendment.description: To improve the availability of contraceptives for women.

action.text: Amendment SA 258 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 258 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 47. Record Vote Number: 45.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 258.
Amendment SA 258 proposed by Senator Murray. To improve the availability of contraceptives for women.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 258 proposed by Senator Murray.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 258 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 47. Record Vote Number: 45.
